title: CM Punjab conducts surprise visit to Chitiana police station
content:
Toba Tek Singh, Oct 24 (APP):Caretaker Chief Minister Mohsin Naqvi on Tuesday conducted an unannounced visit to the Chitiana police station situated 20 kilometers from Toba Tek Singh city.
Chief Secretary Zahid Akhtar Zaman and Inspector General of Police Dr. Usman Anwar were also accompanied by the Chief Minister.
Police officers and operators were noticeably absent from the front desk on which the Chief Minister Mohsin Naqvi expressed his dissatisfaction.
Chief Minister Mohsin Naqvi personally oversaw the processing of applications at the front desk. He also inquired about the status of cases involving individuals in custody at the Chitiana police station.
